discussion.p: Monotonic clocks are generally easy to provide on all systems and are implicitely required by some of the library facilities anyway.

blockquote.del: The class monotonic_clock is conditionally supported.

resolution.blockquote: The member functions whose names end in _for take an argument that specifies a relative time. Implementations should use a monotonic clock to measure time for these functions. [ Note: Implementations are not required to use a monotonic clock because such a clock may not be available. â€” end note ]
